title: Business Development Incentives for Veterans and Military Spouses
subject: veterans

abstracts.abstract: Business Development Incentives for Veterans and Military Spouses;  Creating the "Florida Veterans and Military Spouses Business Development Act"; requiring the Department of State to waive specified fees for certain businesses; providing eligibility and registration requirements for such waivers; providing tax exemptions for certain businesses; providing eligibility requirements for such exemptions; requiring the Department of Revenue to establish procedures for claiming such exemptions, etc.

actions.description: Referred to Military and Veterans Affairs, Space, and Domestic Security; Finance and Tax; Appropriations
